Moroccan Market and Sector indices

Source: R/indices.R
indices.Rd

Gets the Moroccan Market and Sector indices that are listed in Le Boursier.

indices()

sector_indices()

Examples

  indices()

#>                   type                name          last_date    price     open    close variation      low     high
#> 1             ST Index         INDICE MASI 27/11/2020 à 16:00 10888.99 11032.39 11032.39     -1.30 10886.87 11055.77
